content: ribbed hat by dinique diane wilks © 2019 adding a pom pom if you wish to make your own faux fur pom pom you can find my free guide on my website dinique co uk to add the pom pom use your tapestry needle to thread the ends of the pom pom inside the hat in the cinch area the below photos show the positioning of the pom pom on the inside and outside the hat then thread the ends through a button and tie securely i have tied mine in a double bow using a button will allow the pom pom to be removed from the hat for washing you can follow me on instagram dianewilks facebook @diniquecrochet easy ribbed hat by dinique diane wilks © 2019 please do not copy distribute edit or modify this pattern in whole or in part in any way this pattern is intended for personal use only although selling small quantities of finished item is permitted provided i am credited as the designer if you have any queries please contact me at dinique@protonmail com easy ribbed hat by dinique diane wilks © 2019
